ing: 1 1/2 teaspoons active dry yeast or bread machine yeast
des: "A delicious and hearty oatmeal bread. This is especially good when it is hot and fresh, just plain--and really great with a little butter and honey. This recipe is the end result of trial, error and continuous tweaking."
ins: Place the ingredients into the bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer. Select the setting for white bread. Press Start.
